title: CBDT Notifies Income Tax Return Forms for AY 2025-26
content: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has notified ITR-1 to ITR-7 forms for the Assessment Year 2025-26 with changes aligning to the new tax regime.

title: GST Council Meeting: Key Takeaways
content: The 53rd GST Council meeting discussed rate rationalization and introduced clarifications on online gaming, food delivery, and insurance.

title: RBI Increases Repo Rate by 25 Basis Points
content: The Reserve Bank of India raised the repo rate to 6.75% to curb inflation pressures amid rising crude oil prices.

title: SEBI Mandates Additional Disclosures for Listed Companies
content: SEBI now requires quarterly ESG disclosures and enhanced board reporting starting Q3 FY2025.

title: MCA Updates on LLP Filings
content: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has extended the due date for LLP Form 11 to August 31, 2025.
